en.name: English
en.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm Techy, your AI assistant from Techrover. How can I help you today?

greeting: Hello! I'm Techy from Techrover. What can I help you with?
Hi there! I'm here to assist you with any questions about our services.
Welcome to Techrover! I'm Techy, your AI assistant. How may I help?
services: We offer 5 main services: 1) AI Development (₹4,17,000+) - Custom AI agents, chatbots, ML models 2) ERP Systems (₹12,50,000+) - Complete business management 3) Web Development (₹2,50,000+) - Modern responsive websites 4) Digital Marketing (₹1,67,000+) - SEO, social media, PPC 5) Branding (₹1,25,000+) - Logo, brand identity, UI/UX. Which interests you?

Our services include: AI Development with Python/TensorFlow, ERP Systems with React/Node.js, Web Development with Next.js/TypeScript, Digital Marketing with Google Ads/Analytics, and Branding with Figma/Adobe. We've completed 500+ projects for 50+ global clients.
website: For a stone factory website, I recommend: 1) Product Catalog with high-quality stone images 2) Inventory Management System 3) Quote Request System 4) Customer Portal 5) Mobile-responsive design. Estimated cost: ₹3,50,000-6,00,000 (Medium complexity). Timeline: 6-10 weeks. Team: 1 Project Manager, 2 Developers, 1 Designer. Technologies: Next.js, React, CMS integration. Want detailed breakdown?

Stone factory website features: Product showcase, inventory tracking, customer inquiries, quote management, mobile optimization. Cost breakdown: Design & Development ₹2,50,000, CMS Integration ₹1,00,000, Mobile Optimization ₹50,000, Testing & Deployment ₹50,000. Total: ₹4,50,000. Timeline: 8 weeks with our team. Shall I create a detailed proposal?
factory: For factory/manufacturing websites, we provide: Product catalogs, inventory management, customer portals, quote systems, mobile-responsive design. Recent project: Radhika Machine Tools - 40% increase in online inquiries. Cost: ₹3,50,000-8,00,000 depending on features. Timeline: 6-12 weeks. Want to see our manufacturing portfolio?

Manufacturing website essentials: Professional design, product showcase, inquiry forms, inventory integration, mobile optimization, SEO. Technologies: Next.js, React, CMS, payment gateway. Team allocation: Project Manager (60h), Senior Developer (120h), Designer (80h), QA (40h). Total: 300 hours. Cost: ₹4,50,000. Interested?
pricing: Our pricing: Branding ₹1,25,000+, Web Development ₹2,50,000+, Digital Marketing ₹1,67,000+, AI Development ₹4,17,000+, ERP Systems ₹12,50,000+. Prices vary by complexity: Simple (1x), Medium (1.5-2x), Complex (2.5-3x). Use our calculator at /calculator for instant estimates!

We have transparent hourly rates: Senior Developer ₹3,500/hr, Project Manager ₹2,000/hr, UI/UX Designer ₹2,500/hr, QA Engineer ₹1,800/hr. Timeline: 2-16 weeks depending on complexity. Want a detailed quote?
ai: Our AI services: 1) Customer Support Agents (₹299/month) - 24/7 automated support 2) Sales Assistant Agents (₹499/month) - Lead qualification & follow-ups 3) Data Processing Agents (₹399/month) - Document processing & validation 4) Content Creation Agents (₹199/month) - SEO-optimized content. Custom AI development starts at ₹4,17,000. Technologies: Python, TensorFlow, OpenAI, LangChain.

We've built AI solutions for TechCorp USA, InnovateTech India, and FinanceFlow Singapore. Our AI agents can handle 95% of customer queries automatically, increase qualified leads by 40%, and save 80% time on data tasks. What's your use case?
timeline: Project timelines by service: Web Development 4-12 weeks (Simple: 4-6 weeks, Complex: 8-12 weeks), AI Development 6-20 weeks (Basic chatbot: 6-8 weeks, Advanced AI: 12-20 weeks), ERP Systems 8-24 weeks (Small business: 8-12 weeks, Enterprise: 16-24 weeks), Mobile Apps 6-16 weeks. We work 40 hours/week with dedicated teams.

Recent project examples: Insurance ERP (6 months, 8 developers), AI Chatbot Platform (4 months, 5 developers), E-commerce Marketplace (8 months, 12 developers), Hospital Management (10 months, 15 developers). Timeline depends on features, complexity, and team size.
team: Our leadership: Ashok Verma (Founder & CEO, IIT Delhi, 8+ years, Forbes 30 Under 30), Rahul Singh (CTO, BITS Pilani, 6+ years, Tech Innovation Award 2022), Neha Patel (Head of Design, NID Ahmedabad, 5+ years, Best UI/UX Designer 2023), David Miller (International Business Head, Harvard MBA, 7+ years). Team of 20+ professionals with 100+ certifications.

Our team expertise: AI Engineers (Python, TensorFlow, OpenAI), Full Stack Developers (React, Node.js, Next.js), Cloud Architects (AWS, Azure, Kubernetes), UI/UX Designers (Figma, Adobe), Project Managers (PMP, Scrum Master). We've managed teams of 100+ developers across 50+ AI projects.
contact: Contact us: Email hello@techrover.co.in, Phone +91 98765 43210, Office Mumbai India. Business hours: Mon-Fri 9 AM-6 PM IST. We typically respond within 2 hours. You can also schedule a free consultation at /schedule or use our cost calculator at /calculator. Would you like me to connect you with our team?

We have offices in Mumbai (HQ), New York, London, Toronto. Serving 15+ countries with 99% client satisfaction. Recent clients: TechCorp USA ($45K project), SecureLife Insurance (₹70,83,000 ERP), Digital Solutions UK (₹51,65,000). Want to schedule a call or get a quote?
fallback: I'm not sure about that. Let me connect you with one of our team members who can help better.
That's a great question! I'll transfer you to our human expert for detailed assistance.
I'd like to get you the best answer. Let me connect you with our team for personalized help.

hi.name: हिंदी
hi.welcomeMessage: नमस्ते! मैं टेकी हूं, टेकरोवर का AI असिस्टेंट। आज मैं आपकी कैसे मदद कर सकता हूं?

greeting: नमस्ते! मैं टेकरोवर का टेकी हूं। मैं आपकी कैसे मदद कर सकता हूं?
हैलो! मैं यहां आपकी सेवाओं के बारे में सवालों का जवाब देने के लिए हूं।
services: हमारी 5 मुख्य सेवाएं: 1) AI डेवलपमेंट (₹4,17,000+) - कस्टम AI एजेंट, चैटबॉट 2) ERP सिस्टम (₹12,50,000+) - व्यापार प्रबंधन 3) वेब डेवलपमेंट (₹2,50,000+) - आधुनिक वेबसाइट 4) डिजिटल मार्केटिंग (₹1,67,000+) - SEO, सोशल मीडिया 5) ब्रांडिंग (₹1,25,000+) - लोगो, डिजाइन। कौन सी सेवा चाहिए?
हमने 500+ प्रोजेक्ट पूरे किए हैं 50+ ग्लोबल क्लाइंट्स के लिए। टेक्नोलॉजी: Python, React, Next.js, TensorFlow। टीम: IIT/BITS के 20+ प्रोफेशनल्स। 99% क्लाइंट संतुष्टि दर।
pricing: हमारी कीमतें: ब्रांडिंग ₹1,25,000+, वेब डेवलपमेंट ₹2,50,000+, AI डेवलपमेंट ₹4,17,000+, ERP सिस्टम ₹12,50,000+। जटिलता के आधार पर: सिंपल (1x), मीडियम (1.5-2x), कॉम्प्लेक्स (2.5-3x)। /calculator पर तुरंत एस्टिमेट पाएं!
हमारे घंटे के हिसाब से रेट: सीनियर डेवलपर ₹3,500/घंटा, प्रोजेक्ट मैनेजर ₹2,000/घंटा, डिजाइनर ₹2,500/घंटा। समयसीमा: 2-16 सप्ताह। विस्तृत कोटेशन चाहिए?
contact: आप हमसे hello@techrover.co.in या +91 98765 43210 पर संपर्क कर सकते हैं।
क्या आप हमारी टीम से बात करना चाहेंगे?
fallback: मुझे इसके बारे में यकीन नहीं है। मैं आपको हमारे टीम मेंबर से जोड़ता हूं।

es.name: Español
es.welcomeMessage: ¡Hola! Soy Techy, tu asistente de IA de Techrover. ¿Cómo puedo ayudarte hoy?

greeting: ¡Hola! Soy Techy de Techrover. ¿En qué puedo ayudarte?
¡Hola! Estoy aquí para ayudarte con cualquier pregunta sobre nuestros servicios.
services: Nuestros 5 servicios principales: 1) Desarrollo de IA (₹4,17,000+) - Agentes AI personalizados, chatbots 2) Sistemas ERP (₹12,50,000+) - Gestión empresarial completa 3) Desarrollo Web (₹2,50,000+) - Sitios web modernos 4) Marketing Digital (₹1,67,000+) - SEO, redes sociales 5) Branding (₹1,25,000+) - Logo, identidad. ¿Cuál te interesa?
Hemos completado 500+ proyectos para 50+ clientes globales. Tecnologías: Python, React, Next.js, TensorFlow. Equipo de 20+ profesionales de IIT/BITS. 99% satisfacción del cliente.
pricing: Nuestros precios: Branding ₹1,25,000+, Desarrollo Web ₹2,50,000+, Marketing Digital ₹1,67,000+, Desarrollo IA ₹4,17,000+, Sistemas ERP ₹12,50,000+. Por complejidad: Simple (1x), Medio (1.5-2x), Complejo (2.5-3x). ¡Usa nuestra calculadora en /calculator!
Tarifas por hora: Desarrollador Senior ₹3,500/h, Gerente de Proyecto ₹2,000/h, Diseñador ₹2,500/h. Cronograma: 2-16 semanas. ¿Quieres una cotización detallada?
contact: ¿Te gustaría hablar con nuestro equipo humano?
fallback: No estoy seguro sobre eso. Te conectaré con uno de nuestros miembros del equipo.

fr.name: Français
fr.welcomeMessage: Salut! Je suis Techy, votre assistant IA de Techrover. Comment puis-je vous aider aujourd'hui?

greeting: Bonjour! Je suis Techy de Techrover. Comment puis-je vous aider?
Salut! Je suis ici pour vous aider avec toutes vos questions sur nos services.
services: Nos 5 services principaux: 1) Développement IA (₹4,17,000+) - Agents IA personnalisés, chatbots 2) Systèmes ERP (₹12,50,000+) - Gestion d'entreprise complète 3) Développement Web (₹2,50,000+) - Sites web modernes 4) Marketing Digital (₹1,67,000+) - SEO, réseaux sociaux 5) Branding (₹1,25,000+) - Logo, identité. Lequel vous intéresse?
Nous avons complété 500+ projets pour 50+ clients mondiaux. Technologies: Python, React, Next.js, TensorFlow. Équipe de 20+ professionnels d'IIT/BITS. 99% satisfaction client.
pricing: Nos prix: Branding ₹1,25,000+, Développement Web ₹2,50,000+, Marketing Digital ₹1,67,000+, Développement IA ₹4,17,000+, Systèmes ERP ₹12,50,000+. Par complexité: Simple (1x), Moyen (1.5-2x), Complexe (2.5-3x). Utilisez notre calculatrice sur /calculator!
Tarifs horaires: Développeur Senior ₹3,500/h, Chef de Projet ₹2,000/h, Designer ₹2,500/h. Délais: 2-16 semaines. Voulez-vous un devis détaillé?
contact: Vous pouvez nous contacter à hello@techrover.co.in ou +91 98765 43210.
fallback: Je ne suis pas sûr de cela. Laissez-moi vous connecter avec un membre de notre équipe.
